Continued BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger, which apart from having new characters, including the Legion as one of the exclusive to the PSP version.
BlazBlue: Continuum Shift takes all the vital features of its predecessor while adding a few changes themselves. Tsubaki,? -12 And Hazama will join the ranks of the veterans who reborn with additional moves to his arsenal.
